title: Lassen's Deli and Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Deli, salad bar, hot food, fresh juices and smoothies bar inside Lassen's Natural Food Market. Makes vegetarian and vegan sandwich and wraps, marked. Many tables for seating inside. Note: This is featured as 'veg-friendly restaurant' because Bakersfield offers very few choices for vegetarian dining, and this is a good option.
